docs.title: MIND Docs
docs.text:
A simple self hosted reminder application that can send push notifications to your device. Set the reminder and forget about it!

Getting started:

  • Installation
  • Setup After Installation

General Information:

  • API Docs

docs.title: Workings
docs.text: MIND can be used for sending notifications at the desired time. This can be a set time, like a yearly reminder for a birthday, or at a button click, to easily send a predefined notification when you want to.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Works cross-timezone
  • Notifications are sent with second-precision
  • Uses the apprise library, giving you 80+ platforms to send notifications to
  • Easily manage the reminders with sorting options, search ability and color coding
  • Docker image available
  • Mobile friendly web-interface
  • API available

docs.title: Planned Features
docs.text: You can see the planned features in the Project board.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
• For support, a discord server is available
  • Alternatively, make an issue
